titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that an individual may deduct amounts paid for his higher education, or for the higher education of any of his dependents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual income tax deduction of up to $1,000 per year for amounts paid for the higher education of the taxpayer or a dependent.
